Nov 15 (Reuters) - Appaloosa LP:

  • APPALOOSA LP DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN NETFLIX INC - SEC FILING

  • APPALOOSA LP CUTS SHARE STAKE IN AMAZON BY 44% TO 70,000 SHARES - SEC FILING

  • APPALOOSA LP RAISES SHARE STAKE IN OCCIDENTAL BY 16.3% TO 6.6 MILLION SHARES - SEC FILING

  • APPALOOSA LP - CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF SEPTEMBER 30, 2021 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF JUNE 30, 2021

Source for the quarter ended SEPTEMBER 30, 2021: (https://bit.ly/3Fhm9Su)


Source for the quarter ended JUNE 30, 2021: (https://bit.ly/3ou1Udr)
